items.name: Red Bench
items.funFact: Central Park has over 9,000 benches for visitors to rest and enjoy the scenery!

items.name: Squirrel
items.funFact: Central Park is home to thousands of eastern gray squirrels who have adapted to city life.

items.name: Duck Pond
items.funFact: The park's ponds are home to ducks, geese, and other waterfowl year-round.

items.name: Tree
items.funFact: Central Park contains approximately 5,000 trees representing over 150 different species.
